text: This is a list of flags used in and by the United States. ==National flags== Since 1818, a star gets added on the Fourth of July a year after a state gets added to the United States. ==Executive branch flags== ===Office of the President=== ===Office of the Vice President=== ===Department of State=== ===Department of the Treasury=== ===Department of Defense=== ====Department of the Army==== ====Army==== ====Department of the Navy==== =====Marine Corps===== ====Department of the Air Force==== =====Air Force===== =====Space Force===== Category:Lists of flags Category:United States-related lists
title: List of American flags
